name: Legends of Trollskull
description:
This game is heavily indev right now, however I figured I would release a very early demo of what is finished. Please do enjoy and leave any feedback if you so wish.

The game is inspired by Dragon Heist, a module for Dungeons and Dragons, however only loosely follows the story of it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Set in the city of Waterdeep, a great evil has returned to exact their devious plan on  the denizens of the city. Play as a courageous party of adventurers who go from doing oddjob to oddjob to being roiled into a grand war between the evil mage and the city of splendors. 

Unlock and upgrade the abandoned tavern Trollskull Manor to make it your own.

Discover hidden and lost recipes for food dishes and cocktail beverages to satisfy your customers.
